sources.full_text_concat:
Vedāprāmāṇyasiddhi
	    Jitāri
	  Jitāri: Kleine Texte
	    Jitāri
	    Gudrun Bühnemann
	    Arbeitskreis für tibetische und buddhisitsche Studien Universität Wien
	      Wien
	      1982
	      23-26
	  Wiener Studien zur Tibetologie und Buddhismskunde
	    8
	  Kleine Texte is an edition of: Vedāprāmāṇyasiddhi, Sarvajñasiddhi, Nairātmyasiddhi, Jātinirākṛti, and *Īśvaravādimataparīkṣa. Bühneman's edition is based on the manuscript described below.

content.value: . Bühneman's edition is based on the manuscript described below.

Line breaks: In the source file, there were two types of line breaks: returns (and possible surrounding space) and hyphens+returns. These were replaced with lb-elements. The ed-attribute "gb" refers to Bühnemann's

items.text: Line breaks: In the source file, there were two types of line breaks: returns (and possible surrounding space) and hyphens+returns. These were replaced with lb-elements. The ed-attribute "gb" refers to Bühnemann's 1982 edition.

content.value: The glass plate numbers were encoded as pb-elements with the edRef-attribute "#vps-ms".
The corresponding page an line number in Ratnakīrti's
is quoted, were encoded as pb-elements with the edRef-attribute "#vps-r".

items.text: The corresponding page an line number in Ratnakīrti's Pramāṇāntarbhāvaprakaraṇa, in which the Vedāprāmāṇya is quoted, were encoded as pb-elements with the edRef-attribute "#vps-r".

content.value: The variant readings in the footnotes were enclosed in a

items.text: The variant readings in the footnotes were enclosed in a .

content.value: References were enclosed in a ref-element.

items.text: Square brackets were encoded as surplus. This follows Bühnemann 1982 p. 48: [ ] auszulassen.
Angle brackets were encoded as supplied. This 	follows Bühnemann 1982 p. 48: < > zu ergänzen.

content.value: The footnotes were encoded as note-elements with their corresponding n-attribute. The footnote references were replaced with the corresponding note. Line breaks within the notes have been removed

description_content.value: Corrected an "ä" to "ā" on p. 23, and wrapped the change in a

revisions.description_text_summary: Corrected an "ä" to "ā" on p. 23, and wrapped the change in a choice.

children.text: na tāvad ayam asiddho hetuḥ | śabdānām artheṣu
ca sā nirnibandhanā sarveṣāṃ sarvatra pratibaddhasvabhāvatā
utpādayat tatkāryam iti vyaktam avasīyate | anyathā
yadi vastuvaśād eva rūpam upakaroti na rasādikaṃ hanta
rūpeṇa tathā śabdānām api svābhāvika evāstu bahirarthapra
| kiṃ svābhāvika iti svato bhavati | āhosvit parato
svato bhavati tad asaṅgataṃ svātmani kriyāviro
brūmaḥ | cakṣuḥ khalu svahetunā janyamānaṃ tādṛśam eva janitaṃ
yad rūpopakartavyam eva bhavati | rūpam api tādṛśam eva sva
śabdānām api sa svabhāvaḥ svahetupratibaddha eva
tad api duṣkaraṃ doṣāntaraprasaṅgāt | yadi svahetunaiva te
syāpi svārtham avabodhayeyuḥ | yathā cakṣuḥ svaheto
prakāśakam utpannaṃ sat prakāśayaty eva rūpam asaṅketa
vido 'pi | na ca śabdād uccaritād api
atha svahetubhir evāyam īdṛśas teṣāṃ datto
yena te saṅketaviśeṣasahāyā eva kam apy artham avabodhayanti |
yuḥ | yadi hy ayam agnihotraśabdaḥ saṅketāpekṣo yāgaviśeṣapra
na hi kṣityādyapekṣeṇa bījena svahetor aṅkurajanakasvabhāve
tad api na prastutopayogi | na hy evam asya prāmāṇyam
kim ayam abhimatasyaivārthasya dyotako na veti |
vācyavācakalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | tasmān na bahirarthe prati
na ca tasmin pratibandhābhāvalakṣaṇo hetur asti | svaviruddhena
pratibandhena vyāptatvāt | na khalv ayaṃ prādeśikaḥ pramāṇa
śabdaḥ jñāneṣu nirnibandhana eva | sarvajñāneṣu pramāṇavya
pramāṇe dharmiṇi vipakṣe prāmāṇyasya viruddhavyāptasyopalambhena vipakṣe vyava°
na cānyo doṣaḥ saṃbhavī | tasmān nirastāśeṣadoṣeṇa hetunā yat
prasiddhaṃ tad upādeyam eva satām iti |
